entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Langley
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:03 AM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 6.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Abbotsford Airport 12:50 PM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 6.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 5.9°C
Wind: N 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. Temperature steady near 9.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind south 30 km/h except southeast 50 gusting to 70 near the water early this afternoon. Temperature steady near 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Rain ending late this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind south 30 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this evening then southwest 20 after midnight. Low 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early in the morning and late in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022
